tool.name: RTPredict
tool.description: Predicts retention times for peptides using a model trained by RTModel.
tool.command:
RTPredict
#if $param_in_id: -in_id $param_in_id #end if #if $param_in_text: -in_text $param_in_text #end if #if $param_svm_model: -svm_model $param_svm_model #end if #if $param_total_gradient_time: -total_gradient_time $param_total_gradient_time #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_out_id_file: -out_id:file $param_out_id_file #end if #if $param_out_id_positive: -out_id:positive $param_out_id_positive #end if #if $param_out_id_negative: -out_id:negative $param_out_id_negative #end if #if $param_out_text_file: -out_text:file $param_out_text_file #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_max_number_of_peptides: -max_number_of_peptides $adv_opts.param_max_number_of_peptides #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #if $adv_opts.param_out_id_rewrite_peptideidentification_rtmz: -out_id:rewrite_peptideidentification_rtmz #end if #end if

param.name: param_svm_model
param.label: svm model in libsvm format (can be produced by RTModel)

param.name: param_total_gradient_time
param.label: The time (in seconds) of the gradient (peptide RT prediction)

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_max_number_of_peptides
param.label: The maximum number of peptides considered at once (bigger number will lead to faster results but needs more memory)

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: param_out_id_rewrite_peptideidentification_rtmz
param.label: Rewrites each peptideidentification's rt and mz from prediction and calculation (according to the best hit)

tool.help:
Predicts retention times for peptides using a model trained by RTModel.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_RTPredict.html
